title: What do we study in a BSc? - Quora

response.answer_text: hello,i would love to answer this question as I am pursuing it myself..BSc stands for bachelor,s of science..And it is interesting if you do it with interest.In India there is a lot more in this course and a wide range of subjects in which you can do this course.BSc comes in 2 variant like Plain BSc.BSc.Hons.today we have so many options to choose from like biology,mathematics,physics,geology etc.etc. The list goes on.let me come on the point that what we actually study in this course..in simpler words you can understand it as deeper knowledge of theorems..theories..practical knowledge. All this giving you wider knowledge of the subject you chose to do BSc in.. you should prefer doing it from a good college,were you attend classes regularly..A good college gives you a lot more than just knowledge..Their is a lot more one can do after BSc. like teaching,civil services,research feild and much more.. studying is fun only if you have interest.thankyou!do upvote if u find this helping…wishing you all the luck
